It's been raining all day and folks are feeling bold. Dam near everyone around here has some real deal mortars they're setting off.
Usually living in the desert, most folks just stick to bottle rockets and mini mortars.
With the rain, folks are throwing caution to the wind. My pops included. Just got finished with our own we bought down in Mexico a few years back.
Sounds like a lot of fun~
but it sounds better than 3rd year in a row with a mist just at this night
Yeah, the rain stopped maybe 15 minutes before midnight, so it was just kind of perfect. Only a bit of fog and everything is rather very wet.
Almost 40 minutes later and mortars are still going off. Folks are just unloading their caches they've been building up.
Rain is unfortunately just so rare that fire hazard warnings and fines for getting caught setting off real deal fireworks means we never get to do this kind of fun.
don't worry, here it ended at 3AM
I don't mind at all. I love watching fireworks. It's a bit chilly outside, but it hasn't gotten down to freezing temps just yet. Still 42F. (6C)
same temp. here, I'd like to watch some fireworks too, but local weather is trolling hard, also it's almost 9AM
My voice is shot to shit from being sick the last few days, so it's not like I was getting any work done tonight anyways.
It's just a head cold. I'm 75% over it.
3/4 over, 1/4 to go, sounds like an RPG quest ^^

and I'm all out of mana potion :(

Oh, that's one of my Resolutions-I will only stay up really late for streams.
naw I'm just up late at night. I don't need to be up in the morning for anything, and most people I know as well as things I do work better if I'm awake in the afternoon and night.
also, I struggle waking up in any manner at all, Not to mention I sleep like a brick.
I have my alarm set for 6:30, but every morning the bed's so comfy...
I'm getting better at getting up when the alrm rings though.
so there's no point trying to try to wake up early. I fought it my whole life and failed. At this point, I wrap my schedule around doing things that make more sense
My schedule is already in place.
bgr look how smug this is

8-bit music was/is a legit thing. I've just never seen vaporwave used in anything outside of memes.

back in my day we called that chipmunking
First day of 2019. Gotta get that money movin'.

Trying to get the hang of all these emotes
Tom, I wondering how much pages per story you plan to do in "Magical Mishaps". I mean average value.

@TerraTheWizard Btw that fake nightcore "genre" garbage spawned from an actual band called Nightcore which was unironically really good. They had solid music, good meaning, and had an arguably unique shtick.
I thought it would be fun to make one of these stories in color, but... two years to save up Nora Cards...
People overused their songs in videos and other such things, but by themselves, they were not bad.
I've heard a few nightcore songs...they are really awesome to listen to.
lol no I wouldn't allow Nora Cards on them. I'm planning to color them already, someday in the future.
I mean, it seems like a waste if I might color the whole page in the future.
@Azumachan What panel would you like to color?
honestly i dont think they should be wasted to nora cards. save those for actual sketches. still i would like to get one when i can
Health and may the coming year be prosper.
What do you mean Bgr? Nightcore isn't just speeding up popular songs and adding over the top EQ after a pitch shift for a video with slightly edgy anime girl pictures???
You broke my detector, it was brand new
definitely not lies, I watched it happen even

You know. One could argue that nightcore is just that now. The definition of what a thing is does change over time. Like how people associate "Hurt" With Johnny Cash, "The Man Who Sold The World" with Nirvana, "Nimrod" means idiot, etc...
the first two don't make a fuck of sense to me lol xD
but noone seems to know the band of which they're just ripping off and disrespecting for the memes at this point
It's not disrespect, it is just what it is at this point.
:thinking: Though I'd argue it's probably unintentional for the most part
Technically, I would like to see Maddie's face from second frame in color. https://www.patreon.com/posts/magical-mishaps-23421341 , but use Nora Card only for this....

"Hurt" is an incredibly popular cover song from Johnny Cash that originally came from Nine Inch Nails. Nirvana covered "The Man Who Sold The World". Those covers are no longer associated with the original artists almost at all anymore.
Same thing happened with Disturbed "Sound of Silence" coever.
It would be nice if Tom had a cheap version of the Nora Cards for simple things.
Those are covers though. They're intentionally covering and paying respect and redoing the original songs in a new style. :u

The nightcore thing is just people speeding songs up for the memes. They don't care if there's a band that it came from, hell, if they even knew at all, they just see a bunch of badly sped up songs to cringe videos and do it themselves
And "Nightcore" variants are just that. Altered versions. Styles. You may not like it, but this is what peak producer performance looks like.
For example I don't like this sketch https://yadi.sk/i/lu1uEFIvREytnA but Maid Nibs is top.
that's not paying reference to the band, it's just ripping off the band's shtick while using the meme to make fun of how it sounds. There's a reason the band was drowned out by the meme.
Because the meme is superior. It all makes sense now.
Inferior = superior.. ? The sarcasm is real. :u
@iliar i doubt there is enough demand for those "simple" things to warrant tom making it a thing. :/
